doc.field: This Berkeley spot, adjacent to a wholesale Indian grocery, is as famous for its eccentricities (warehouse setting...
Vik's has moved into larger quarters and put in a door, but it's still a warehouse, and it still serves the best...
It's Vik's Chaat Corner, rumored by many to offer the best Indian food in the Bay Area. With that kind of reputation...
Located in a windowless warehouse where the only utensils on hand are sporks, this West Berkeley institution is home...
Once you taste the vibrant flavors coming out of this Indian kitchen, you'll forget the warehouse surroundings.
